cheatsheet.title: Create a new model from an example

intro.description: In this step you will create a new Qompass model from an example

item.title: Open Papyrus Perspective
item.description: Start setting up your environment's perspective.

item.title: Create a new project
item.description: Creating the project that will host your model. You can skip this step, if you want to create the model in an existing project. File > New > Project. Enter your project name.

item.title: Create a new project
item.description: Create a new model from an example. File > New > Example. Choose an Qompass example. Select the parent folder (it is not possible to change the name of the example, since the model files reference each other. Use File > Save As after opening, if required).
